question:
You are studying overseas. You need to return to your country before the end of the semester for a family event.
Write a letter to your supervisor. In your letter

     - request time off
     - explain why you need to leave early
     - reassure him/her that your studies will not suffer
text: I am writing this letter with regard to my request to return home before the end of this term.

As you may know, I have not travelled to my home country for the last 2 years. Therefore, I missed my family and friends very much. Moreover, my parents’ 40th anniversary will be celebrated in this summer.

Nonetheless, there are a few other reasons why I should go home earlier. Primarily, I want to take a treatment for my eyes because the university’s doctor recommended it last month. Furthermore, I bought some gifts for my parents’ special day. Lastly, I have finished my final assignments from all subjects already.

There were only 2 supplementary classes in this semester which were Economics and Finance. Both professors required me to email them written summaries of the last classes’ articles, in order to mark my final grade. This is why, I can assure you that my early departure may not have detrimental impacts on my academic achievements.
I hope you will understand my situation.

error_list.error_des: The abbreviated title Mr. seems to be punctuated incorrectly. Consider changing the punctuation.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma after the subordinating conjunction why. Consider removing the comma.
